text: @TimODee16 I was just thinking @SpeakerPelosi is getting closer to the presidency if Trump & Pence end up testing positive for #Covid19 —Trump’s fat and that’s a high risk factor! Keep feeding him hamburgers. As you say, 2 ventilators away. 🙏🏼
